discussion.author: proux01
discussion.comment:
CI is morally green:
* `Nix CI for bundle coq-master / mathcomp-doc` is likely unrelated
* `Nix CI for bundle coq-8.11 / mathcomp-analysis`, `Nix CI for bundle coq-8.12 / mathcomp-analysis`, `Gitlab CI job ci-analysis-8.11` and `Gitlab CI job ci-analysis-8.12` are due to analysis recently dropping 8.11 and 8.12 support (I'll do a separate PR to remove those jobs from the CI here)

So I'll merge tomorrow if there is no further comment.

tags.description: Issue or PR about the CI. (Gitlab CI or CI of dependencies problems linked with math-comp)
